channel.title: Hard Summer on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Two Killed, Six Injured in Shooting at Hard Summer Festival Afterparty in Los Angeles
item.description: Two people were killed and six were injured at an afterparty for Hard Summer music festival in downtown Los Angeles early Monday morning. According to the Associated Press, police arrived at the event
